newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israelis kill three Palestinians in Gaza clashes.
newsitem.headline: Israelis kill three Palestinians in Gaza clashes.

text.p: Israeli soldiers shot dead three Palestinians and wounded more than 50 in clashes in the Gaza Strip on Thursday, hospital sources said.
A Jewish settler spokeswoman said six Israelis were injured, five of them soldiers.
The deaths raised to eight the number of Palestinians killed in two days of clashes with Israeli forces over Israeli policy in Jerusalem, holy to Moslems and Jews.

Ahli hospital officials said Palestinian policeman Qusai Okasha, 20, died in hospital after being shot. Shifa hospital in Gaza said Hani Moussa was shot dead in a clash near Kfar Darom Jewish settlement. Rizk Hawajreh, 32, was also shot dead, a doctor at Shifa said.
The Israeli army said a lieutenant-colonel was moderately wounded by a gunshot.
Palestinian hospital sources said some 50 Palestinians were wounded.
